00022 #define IMAGE_CLASSIFIER_H

00028 #include "image_class_example.h"
00029 #include "example_generator.h"

00032 
00033 
00034 enum{ 
00035         DETECT_MODEL_POINTS=0,
00036         BUILDING_TREE=1,
00037         FOREST_REFINEMENT=2,
00038         GENERATING_TESTING_SET=3
00039 };
00040 
00041 typedef void (*LEARNPROGRESSION)(int,int,int);
00042 
00047 class image_classifier
00048 {
00049 public:
00050   image_classifier(int image_width, int image_height, int class_number, LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress=0);
00051   image_classifier(LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress=0);
00052 
00053   virtual ~image_classifier() { }
00054 
00055   virtual bool load(string /*directory_name*/) { return false; }
00056   virtual bool save(string /*directory_name*/) { return false; }
00057   virtual void refine(example_generator * vg, int call_number) = 0;
00058   virtual void test(example_generator * vg, int call_number) = 0;
00059   virtual int recognize(image_class_example * pv, float * confidence = 0, int dummy = 0) = 0 ;
00060   virtual float * posterior_probabilities(image_class_example * pv, int dummy = 0) = 0;
00061 
00062   LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgression;
00063   
00064   int image_width, image_height;
00065   int class_number;
00066 
00067 };
